text: Po Nashey mudrosti My opredelili put' luny po fazam: malen'kaya v nachale mesyatsa, ona, po mere togo, kak prokhodyat nochi, uvelichivayetsya do tekh por, poka ne stanet polnoy lunoy. Zatem ona nachinayet umen'shat'sya takim zhe obrazom, poka ne stanet , tochno vysokhshaya pal'movaya vetv', izognutoy i zholtoy
